code: import{RECEIVE_PRODUCTS,ADD_TO_CART,SELECT_TYPE,SELECT_SIZE}from'../constants/actionTypes';var initPState={products:[]};var products=function products(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initPState.products;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case RECEIVE_PRODUCTS:return action.products;case ADD_TO_CART:return state;case SELECT_TYPE:return state;case SELECT_SIZE:return state;default:return state;}};export default products;
